text: Anne of the Indies is a 1951 American adventure movie directed by Jacques Tourneur and based on the 1947 story of the same name by Herbert Sass. It stars Jean Peters, Louis Jourdan, Debra Paget, Herbert Marshall, James Robertson Justice, Byron Nelson and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1951 adventure movies Category:American adventure movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Jacques Tourneur Category:Movies set in the 18th century Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in the Caribbean
title: Anne of the Indies
